sentences.en: His talent was submerged by his shyness.
sentences.cn: 他的才华为其羞怯所遮覆.

sentences.en: I am absolutely submerged in work.
sentences.cn: 我完全沉浸在工作之中了.

sentences.en: I was submerged in reading an exciting book, and didn't hear the doorbell ring.
sentences.cn: 我正在全神贯注地看一本极有趣的书, 没听见门铃响.

sentences.en: It has been applied to attached algae and submerged vascular plants.
sentences.cn: 这已经用于附生藻类和沉水维管束植物中.

sentences.en: Most of the mouth of the cave was submerged in the lake.
sentences.cn: 洞口大半都淹没在湖里。

sentences.en: My right toe struck against a submerged rock.
sentences.cn: 我的右脚趾踢到水中的一块石头上了。

sentences.en: She submerged her hands in warm water.
The car was submerged under 20 feet of water.
The main argument was submerged in a mass of tedious detail.
sentences.cn: 大量单调乏味的细节掩盖了主要论点.

sentences.en: The man, submerged in his overcoat, listened to the conversation.
sentences.cn: 那个人用大衣密密实实地裹住全身, 聆听谈话.

sentences.en: The mud - rock flow submerged the whole village.
sentences.cn: 泥石流埋没了整个村庄.

sentences.en: The river overflowed and submerged the farmland.
The ship was bilged by a submerged reef.
sentences.cn: 船撞上暗礁,结果船底漏了.

words.tran_cn: 能浸入水中的；可潜入水中的
能潜水的；能沉入水中的
浸没（submerse的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 在水中的，淹没的，水下的，水下运动的
trans.tran_en: If something is submerged, it is below the surface of some water

trans.tran_cn: （使）潜入水中，淹没( submerge的过去式和过去分词 )，完全掩盖，遮掩
